segments.source_content:
---
slug: /210
title: "This Week In React #210: React 19 pre-warming, Next.js, IDE, TanStack, React Scan, MistCSS, PayloadCMS, Expo Workflows, Universal RSC, use dom, Yoga JSI, Skia, Turbo Haptics, TV, FastIO, SwiftUI, Angular 19..."
authors: [matthieugicquel, cyrilbo]
date: 11-20-2024
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: Hi everyone!

translations.zh-hant: 大家好！

segments.source_content: Cyril and Matthieu from Theodo Apps (formerly BAM) here 👋, standing in for Seb to bring you the latest news from React and React Native!

translations.zh-hant: 我們是來自 Theodo Apps（前身為 BAM）的 Cyril 和 Matthieu 👋，本週代替 Seb 為您帶來 React 和 React Native 的最新消息！

segments.source_content: Big news from the React world this week! React 19 is back in RC, six months after its initial release was postponed. The suspense over Suspense is finally easing with the introduction of pre-warming.

translations.zh-hant: 本週 React 界傳來重大消息！在初次發布延期六個月後，React 19 終於重回 RC 階段。隨著 pre-warming 機制的引入，Suspense 的懸念終於逐漸明朗。

segments.source_content: Expo is making waves during its launch party, and the excitement keeps building! 🚀

translations.zh-hant: Expo 正在其發布派對中掀起波瀾，熱潮持續高漲！🚀

segments.source_content: The newly announced **Expo Workflows** promises to revolutionize CI/CD for React Native apps with pre-packaged jobs, intelligent machine selection, and seamless automation — streamlining the entire release process.

translations.zh-hant: 新宣布的 **Expo Workflows** 承諾將通過預封裝任務、智能機器選擇和無縫自動化，徹底改變 React Native 應用的 CI/CD 流程 — 簡化整個發布流程。

segments.source_content: Meanwhile, **Universal React Server Components** in Expo Router have entered beta, marking a major milestone in the journey toward **server-first React Native development**.

translations.zh-hant: 與此同時，Expo Router 中的**通用 React Server Components** 已進入測試階段，標誌著邁向**服務器優先的 React Native 開發**的重要里程碑。

segments.source_content: And the party isn’t over yet! 🎉 Stay tuned for next week’s issue, where we’ll dive into even more announcements from Expo’s ongoing celebration.

translations.zh-hant: 派對還沒結束！🎉 敬請期待下期內容，我們將深入探討 Expo 持續慶祝活動中的更多公告。

segments.source_content: Also check our partner conf [React Paris 2025](https://react.paris/?utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) (🇫🇷 Paris - 20 & 21 March). Kick off your year with one of the first dev conferences of 2025! Speakers include Dominik 'TkDodo' Dorfmeister, Kent C. Dodds, and Aurora Scharff. CFPs are open, and you can get 20% off tickets with code "TWIR"!

translations.zh-hant: 另請關注我們的合作會議 [React Paris 2025](https://react.paris/?utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=thisweekinreact)（🇫🇷 巴黎 - 2025年3月20-21日）。用 2025 年首批開發者會議之一開啟新年！講者包括 Dominik 'TkDodo' Dorfmeister、Kent C. Dodds 和 Aurora Scharff。CFP 現已開放，使用代碼 "TWIR" 可享門票 8 折優惠！

segments.source_content: We'd be super grateful if you'd share this newsletter or support us here :

translations.zh-hant: 若您能分享本通訊或在此支持我們，我們將萬分感激：

segments.source_content:
- [X / Twitter](https://slo.im/last/x)
- [Bluesky](https://slo.im/last/b)
- [LinkedIn](https://slo.im/last/l)

translations.zh-hant:
- [X / Twitter](https://slo.im/last/x)
- [Bluesky](https://slo.im/last/b)
- [LinkedIn](https://slo.im/last/l)

segments.source_content: Let’s dive in! 🚀

translations.zh-hant: 讓我們開始吧！🚀

segments.source_content: ## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor1}

translations.zh-hant: ## 💸 贊助商 {#sponsor1}

segments.source_content: [![Handsontable: Advanced data grid for your React app](/emails/issues/206/handsontable.jpg)](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20)

translations.zh-hant: [![Handsontable：適用於 React 應用的高級數據表格](/emails/issues/206/handsontable.jpg)](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20)

segments.source_content: **[Handsontable: Advanced data grid for your React app](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20)**

translations.zh-hant: **[Handsontable：適用於 React 應用的高級數據表格](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20)**

segments.source_content: Handsontable is [a feature-rich data grid](https://handsontable.com/demo?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20) designed for React developers who need a powerful, customizable, and accessible solution to manage complex data.

translations.zh-hant: Handsontable 是[功能豐富的數據表格](https://handsontable.com/demo?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20)，專為需要強大、可自訂且具無障礙功能的 React 開發者設計，用於管理複雜數據。

segments.source_content:
- A unique **spreadsheet-like interface** with sorting, filtering, and CRUD operations
- Advanced operations like conditional formatting and **400 built-in formulas**, similar to Excel
- **Customizable editors and renderers**, allowing dropdowns, menus or custom components within grid cells to fit specific use cases
- **Optimized performance** for smooth and responsive interactions
- **Accessibility with WCAG 2.1 compliance** for better support for users with disabilities

translations.zh-hant:
- 獨特的**類試算表介面**，具排序、篩選和 CRUD 操作功能
- 進階操作如條件格式化和 **400 多個內建公式**，類似 Excel
- **可自訂編輯器和渲染器**，允許在表格單元格內使用下拉選單、選單或自訂組件以滿足特定需求
- **性能優化**，確保流暢響應的交互體驗
- **符合 WCAG 2.1 無障礙標準**，為殘障用戶提供更佳支援

segments.source_content: Handsontable adapts to various use cases, from enterprise applications to simple websites, offering performance and flexibility trusted by companies worldwide.

translations.zh-hant: Handsontable 適用於各種場景，從企業級應用到簡單網站，提供全球企業信賴的性能與靈活性。

segments.source_content: [Get started today!](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20)

translations.zh-hant: [立即開始使用！](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20)

segments.source_content: ## ⚛️ React {#react}

translations.zh-hant: ## ⚛️ React {#react}

segments.source_content: [![React 19 RC1](/emails/issues/210/react19.jpg)](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898#issuecomment-2477449973)

translations.zh-hant: [![React 19 RC1](/emails/issues/210/react19.jpg)](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898#issuecomment-2477449973)

segments.source_content: [**React 19 RC1 - Siblings pre-warming**](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898#issuecomment-2477449973)

translations.zh-hant: [**React 19 RC1 - 兄弟元件預熱機制**](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898#issuecomment-2477449973)

segments.source_content:
We’ve covered how the initial release of React 19 was aborted because of a change in Suspense that would have caused waterfalls in apps that use Suspense without starting fetches in event handlers.  
The React team has been hard at work to reintroduce Suspense sibling prerendering without causing performance regressions for apps that start fetching early. Their solution is now ready and it’s called [pre-warming](https://react.dev/blog/2024/04/25/react-19-upgrade-guide#improvements-to-suspense). Dominik, the React Query maintainer who raised awareness of this problem, [has confirmed he’s happy with the fix](https://bsky.app/profile/tkdodo.eu/post/3layw6wk5bs2b).  
As usual, the new features were already available in Next.JS (which uses react canary). They include server components and actions, the new `use` hook, improvements to forms handling (`useFormStatus` and `useOptimistic`), and a small but long-awaited change: `forwardRef` is not necessary anymore!

translations.zh-hant:
我們先前報導過 React 19 初始版本因 Suspense 變更導致中止發布的問題——該變更會在使用 Suspense 但未在事件處理器中啟動資料獲取的應用中引發瀑布流問題。  
React 團隊持續努力重新引入 Suspense 兄弟元件預渲染機制，同時確保不會對早期啟動資料獲取的應用造成效能衰退。他們的解決方案現已就緒，稱為[預熱機制 (pre-warming)](https://react.dev/blog/2024/04/25/react-19-upgrade-guide#improvements-to-suspense)。最先提出此問題的 React Query 維護者 Dominik [已確認對此修復方案感到滿意](https://bsky.app/profile/tkdodo.eu/post/3layw6wk5bs2b)。  
如同往常，新功能已提前在 Next.JS（採用 React Canary）中提供，包含伺服器元件與 Actions、新 `use` 鉤子、表單處理改進（`useFormStatus` 與 `useOptimistic`），以及一個微小但期待已久的變更：不再需要 `forwardRef`！

segments.source_content:
- 💸 [Omlet – Scan your repo and measure how and where React components are used](https://omlet.dev/?utm_campaign=partner_this-week-in-react_newsletter-quick-link-nov-2024)
- 👀 [Next.js segment cache initial implementation](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/72875): A rewrite of App Router's client caching implementation, designed with PPR and "use cache" in mind. Not production-ready at all, but in the future Next will cache by route segment instead of by full URL.
- 👀 [React Query may soon have a unified staleTime per query](https://github.com/TanStack/query/pull/8313) instead of one per “observer” (e.g. each `useQuery`). This will be less flexible but certainly easier to reason about.
- 👀 [React IDE](https://youtu.be/C8Mg-NSyqWg?t=14452): Mofei (React Compiler team) unveils at React Summit the plan to work on a VSCode extension powered by the compiler. Don't get too excited, because we don't know much about it yet!
- 👀 [TanStack Start is officially in beta](https://bsky.app/profile/tannerlinsley.com/post/3lbdl4zp2ns2n)
- 📖 [The Road to Next](https://www.road-to-next.com/): Robin Wieruch launched his paid Next.js 15 course with early access discounts.
- 🗓️ [React Day Berlin](https://reactday.berlin/?utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) - 🇩🇪 Berlin - 13 & 16 December - Hurry and grab your ticket to the conference as prices are about to go up! And don’t forget your discount with code “TWIR”.
- 📜 [Essential Typescript for React](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/react-ts): A concise article on the most valuable tips to be productive.
- 📜 [Be careful with useSyncExternalStore](https://www.nico.fyi/blog/be-careful-with-usesyncexternalstore): implementation of a `useLocalStorage` hook using `useSyncExternalStore` and `superjson`.
- 📜 [5 differences between React server components and server-side rendering](https://www.tymzap.com/blog/5-differences-between-react-server-components-and-server-side-rendering): At this point you already know that they are not at all the same. This recaps the concrete differences between the two.
- 📜 [Design System: from scratch or from the shelf?](https://www.voorhoede.nl/en/blog/design-system-from-scratch-from-the-shelf/)
- 📜 [What are React Portals?](https://techhub.iodigital.com/articles/what-are-react-portals)
- 📜 [Creating your own React design system analytics tool with react-scanner](https://alexocallaghan.com/creating-your-own-react-design-system-analytics-tool)
- 📜 [Quick Guide to Building a PWA with Next.js](https://playfulprogramming.com/posts/pwa-nextjs-guide)
- 📜 [Vercel - Skew Protection is now enabled by default for new projects](https://vercel.com/changelog/skew-protection-is-now-enabled-by-default-for-new-projects)
- 📜 [React Anti-Pattern: Stop Passing Setters Down the Components Tree](https://matanbobi.dev/posts/stop-passing-setter-functions-to-components)
- 📦 [react-scan](https://github.com/aidenybai/react-scan): The MillionJS team released a new tool to find performance issues (re-renders) in React apps.
- 📦 [PayloadCMS 3.0 \- Seamless integration with Next.js app router](https://github.com/payloadcms/payload/releases/tag/v3.0.0): The CMS can now run seamlessly within your existing Next.js app, exposing a `withPayload()` plugin.
- 📦 [MistCSS 1.0](https://github.com/typicode/mistcss): Instead of generating full React components from CSS, the library now bets on generating types to enhance intrinsic React JSX elements. Interesting idea!
- 🎥 [Jack Herrington - “use cache” NextJS’s latest take on data caching](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZDRGEewXkrs)
- 🎥 [Theo - How To Avoid Big Serverless Bills](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jsuNjCAngnQ): Various tips for Vercel or Next.js users.
- 🎥 [React Summit US - Live Stream](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C8Mg-NSyqWg)

segments.source_content: ## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor2}

translations.zh-hant: ## 💸 贊助 {#sponsor2}

segments.source_content: [![Unleash Document Superpowers in Your React Apps!](/emails/issues/209/nutrient.jpg)](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)

translations.zh-hant: [![在您的 React 應用中釋放文件超能力！](/emails/issues/209/nutrient.jpg)](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)

segments.source_content: **[Unleash Document Superpowers in Your React Apps!](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)**

translations.zh-hant: **[在您的 React 應用中釋放文件超能力！](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)**

segments.source_content: Attention React enthusiasts: PSPDFKit is now **Nutrient**! 👋 We may have a new name, but our Web SDK is the same best in class choice you've come to rely on for viewing, annotating, and editing PDFs and other document types.

translations.zh-hant: React 愛好者請注意：PSPDFKit 現已更名為 **Nutrient**！👋 我們雖有新名稱，但 Web SDK 仍是您所信賴的頂級解決方案，用於檢視、註解和編輯 PDF 及其他文件類型。

segments.source_content:
- 🏎️ Get started quickly with a free trial and extensive documentation
- ⏱️ Save time developing by leveraging the slick built-in UI and **Baseline-UI**, our new design system
- 🛠️ Leverage extensive APIs for processing and customization
- 🆘 Make use of our support and solution engineering team to get help from domain experts

translations.zh-hant:
- 🏎️ 透過免費試用和完整文件快速上手
- ⏱️ 利用精緻內建 UI 和我們的新設計系統 **Baseline-UI** 節省開發時間
- 🛠️ 運用豐富的處理與自訂 API
- 🆘 透過我們的支援與解決方案工程團隊獲取領域專家協助

segments.source_content: We've got you covered on **all platforms** from mobile to backend.

translations.zh-hant: 我們提供**全平台支援**，從行動裝置到後端無一遺漏。

segments.source_content: Want to work on challenging problems and have **impact on hundreds of applications**? Check out our open positions such as [Senior Frontend Developer](https://www.nutrient.io/company/careers/web-frontend).

translations.zh-hant: 想挑戰難題並**影響數百個應用程式**？查看我們的職缺如[資深前端開發工程師](https://www.nutrient.io/company/careers/web-frontend)。

segments.source_content: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

translations.zh-hant: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.source_content: [![Expo Workflows](/emails/issues/210/workflows.jpg)](https://expo.dev/blog/expo-workflows-automate-your-release-process)

translations.zh-hant: [![Expo 工作流程](/emails/issues/210/workflows.jpg)](https://expo.dev/blog/expo-workflows-automate-your-release-process)

segments.source_content:
[**Expo Workflows**](https://expo.dev/blog/expo-workflows-automate-your-release-process)
Expo has announced "Workflows," a new CI/CD tool for React Native and Expo apps that simplifies and accelerates app releases with pre-packaged jobs (such as E2E tests using Maestro), automated workflows, and smart machine selection for optimal performance. While it’s not a direct replacement for more general CI/CD solutions like GitHub Actions, it promises exciting improvements worth exploring.

translations.zh-hant:
[**Expo 工作流程**](https://expo.dev/blog/expo-workflows-automate-your-release-process)
Expo 宣布「工作流程」，這是針對 React Native 和 Expo 應用的全新 CI/CD 工具，透過預封裝任務（如使用 Maestro 的端對端測試）、自動化流程和智能機器選擇來簡化並加速應用發布。雖然它不能完全替代 GitHub Actions 等通用 CI/CD 解決方案，但提供了值得探索的創新改進。

segments.source_content: 🎉 [Expo Launch Party](https://expo.dev/launch-party) is still running. Don’t miss their announcements\!

translations.zh-hant: 🎉 [Expo 發布派對](https://expo.dev/launch-party)仍在進行中，請勿錯過他們的公告！

segments.source_content:
- 📣 [Expo \- Introducing Channel Pausing for EAS Update : Pause your channels either on the web page or via the eas cli](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/11-14-channel-pausing)
- 📜 [Universal React Server Components in Expo Router (in beta)](https://expo.dev/blog/universal-react-server-components-developer-preview): Expo Router introduces for the first time universal React Server Components, enabling server-side rendering in both native and web apps. Though not production-ready due to unavailable production exports and mainly aimed at library authors, it's an exciting development because it enables direct server-side access to resources like secrets, databases, and file systems, simplifying development and improving performance by eliminating client-server round trips.
- 📜 [The magic of Expo DOM Components](https://expo.dev/blog/the-magic-of-expo-dom-components): Expo DOM Components make it easier to integrate web features into React Native apps, combining the speed of WebViews with incremental native migration. While limited by WebView performance and compatibility with some Expo features, future updates aim to enhance native integration and optimize performance.

translations.zh-hant:
- 📣 [Expo - 推出 EAS 更新的頻道暫停功能：您可以在網頁上或透過 eas cli 暫停您的頻道](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/11-14-channel-pausing)
- 📜 [Expo Router 中的通用 React 伺服器元件（測試版）](https://expo.dev/blog/universal-react-server-components-developer-preview)：Expo Router 首次引入了通用 React 伺服器元件，可在原生和 Web 應用中實現伺服器端渲染。雖然由於生產版本導出不可用而尚未準備好投入生產，且主要針對函式庫作者，但這是一個令人興奮的進展，因為它能夠直接從伺服器端存取資源，如密鑰、資料庫和檔案系統，從而簡化開發並透過消除客戶端-伺服器往返來提高效能。
- 📜 [Expo DOM 元件的魔力](https://expo.dev/blog/the-magic-of-expo-dom-components)：Expo DOM 元件讓將 Web 功能整合到 React Native 應用程式中變得更容易，它結合了 WebView 的速度和漸進式原生遷移。雖然受到 WebView 效能和與某些 Expo 功能的相容性限制，但未來的更新旨在增強原生整合並優化效能。

segments.source_content:
- 💸 [notJust Hack - the best online Hackathon for React Native developers. This December - build, launch, compete, and win prizes!](https://bit.ly/4fDgOXX)
- 📖 [Mastering the Big Screen: React Native for TV guidebook](https://www.callstack.com/ebook/mastering-the-big-screen-react-native-for-tv-guidebook)
- 🐦 [Oskar made a POC of Jetpack Compose adaptive navigation for react-native-bottom-tabs](https://x.com/o_kwasniewski/status/1858620684706214095)
- 🐦 [Mike demoed a 1.2GB file upload over the network with React Native FastIO](https://x.com/grabbou/status/1858920818744389947)
- 🐦 [Jay is cooking a new List component, codename Legend List, that may be even faster than FlashList](https://x.com/jmeistrich/status/1855663310386958840)
- 🐦 [SwiftUI MeshGradient component in React Native thanks to a new feature in Expo Modules not yet announced in Expo SDK 52](https://bsky.app/profile/tsapeta.dev/post/3lbf2kw75t22y)
- 📜 [How to Integrate React Native With an Existing App](https://www.callstack.com/blog/how-to-integrate-react-native-with-an-existing-app)
- 📦 [React Native 0.76.2](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.76.2)
- 📦 [React Native Executorch 0.1 \- Run AI models on device, powered by ExecuTorch](https://blog.swmansion.com/introducing-react-native-executorch-2bdb87592884)
- 📦 [React Native SVG 15.9 \- New filters FeDropShadow and FeComposite](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-svg/releases/tag/v15.9.0)
- 📦 [React Native Gesture Handler 2.21 \- Two-finger Pan gesture on web, new `ReanimatedDrawerLayout` component](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-gesture-handler/releases/tag/2.21.0)
- 📦 [React Native Screens 4.1 & 4.2 \- Fix iOS modal animation issues on old architecture, support for transparent large header on iOS](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-screens/releases/tag/4.2.0)
- 📦 [React Native Video 6.8 \- Web Support and HLS video caching](https://github.com/TheWidlarzGroup/react-native-video/releases/tag/v6.8.0)
- 📦 [React Native Skia 1.5.4 \- Experimental Graphite (Vulkan/Metal) backend via build flag](https://github.com/Shopify/react-native-skia/releases/tag/v1.5.4)
- 📦 [React Native Turbo Haptics \- Fast, worklet-compatible haptic feedback](https://github.com/christianbaroni/react-native-turbo-haptics)
- 📦 [React Native Yoga JSI 0.1](https://github.com/Swami-Laxmikant/react-native-yoga-jsi): This experimental lib gives you access to Yoga APIs on the JS side. It can be used with libs like React Native Skia to layout elements on a canvas.
- 🎙️ [Rocket Ship 54 \- React Native Music Game with Kim Chouard (Skia, NativeWind, Expo AV)](https://share.transistor.fm/s/34b8c9fc)
- 🎥 [Simon Grimm \- Expo SDK 52: DOM, RSC, Router, New Architecture & Packages](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OROMGU3jq6E)
